lead_paragraph: After the bombing of Pearl Harbor, a New York Times editor made the decision to run a crossword puzzle in the paper to offer relief to its war-weary readers. Seventy-five years later, The New York Times Crossword continues to be a source of comfort for readers. Here's how it got there.
